title: Crime Alert 10.26.18
itunes:title: Crime Alert 10.26.18
description:
Two middle school girls plot murder of classmates. Mom is outraged after a video of bullies holding a gun to her autistic son is released. Jamie Lee Curtis admits to opioid addiction.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
